name: Germified!
description:
Doctor, I’m afraid you’ve been miniaturized. You’ll have to cure your patient from the inside by destroying the germs and saving the good blood platelets.

IMPORTANT: This game is currently in EARLY DEVELOPMENT.  So there is only one level for the time being.  But rest assured there will regular updates that add new content the the game. 

This is my take on Unity's FPS Creator Kit!

System Requirements

Minimum:                                                              Recommended:

.Intel Core i3 2100                                          .Intel Core i5 4440

.4gb RAM                                                              .8gb RAM

.Nvidia GeForce GT 1030                            .NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650

.250mb Hard Drive.                                        .300mb SSD
